text: Allah‌ [1], tini chara kono satya ilaha ne'i [2]. Tini ciranjiba, sarbasattara dharaka [3]. Tamke tandra'o sparsa karate pare na, nidra'o naya [4]. Asamanasamuhe ya rayeche o yamine ya rayeche saba'i tamra [5]. Ke se, ye tamra anumati byatita tamra kache suparisa karabe [6]? Tadera samane o pechane ya kichu ache ta tini janena [7]. Ara ya tini icche karena ta chara tamra jnanera kono kichuke'i tara paribestana karate pare na [8]. Tamra ‘kurasi’ asamanasamuha o yaminake paribyapta kare ache [9]; ara e dutora raksanabeksana tamra jan'ya bojha haya na [10]. Ara tini su'ucca sumahana
